lingo-desc: Provides hover-over tool tips on pages from words defined on a wiki page
lingo-noterminologypage: The terminology page "$1" does not exist.
lingo-notatextpage: The terminology page "$1" is not a text page.
lingo-terminologypagenotlocal: Page "$1" is not a local page.
lingo-noapprovedrevs: Support for ApprovedRevs is enabled in Lingo. But ApprovedRevs was not found.
lingo-element-linktext: Go to the page with the definition of '$1'
